name: Herbed Garlic and Mushroom Pasta
description: A quick high-fibre, low-sodium recipe that’s sure to satisfy!
preparation: Preheat a large frying pan over medium-high heat.
Add oil and swirl to coat pan. Add mushrooms, cooking until golden brown.
Sprinkle Caesar Dressing Mix over all and stir. Add wine and Vegetable Bouillon. Simmer until sauce is slightly thickened.
Pour sauce over pasta. Toss to coat and serve.
tips: Once you've decided “tonight's the night for pasta,” put the water on to boil. Boiling the water and cooking the pasta takes the longest time.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with grilled white fish and seasonal vegetables.

products.name: Caesar Dressing Mix
summary: This dressing is a little bit of magic: It’s rich, creamy, full of flavor, and it has zero sodium! Take it far beyond Caesar salad and use it as a sauce for pizza, a dip for veggies, chicken fingers, and zucchini fries, or mix it in your white pasta sauce. Simply mix the blend with mayo or Greek yogurt, lemon juice, olive oil, and milk, and it’s ready for anything!
